ingest-processing.identification: Yes, only markup declaration conforming to the plain text identification rules and the well-formedness rules defined in the XML 1.0 specification are identified as DTD.
ingest-processing.validation: Yes. DTD must conform to the validation rules specified in the XML 1.0 specification.
ingest-processing.characterization: Yes. Extracted technical metadata are described in section 2.2 of XML DTD action plan background.

significant-properties.content: All textual content will be preserved.
significant-properties.context: N/A. DTD may contain definitions for storing contextual information. It does not contain the actual context.
significant-properties.behavior: Constraints defined in DTD files will be preserved.
significant-properties.structure: Document structures defined in DTD files will be preserved.
significant-properties.appearance: N/A. DTD does not provide a way to specify how DTD documents may be displayed.

long-term-strategy.original: Migrate to a newer version of XML DTD or to a different XML schema language when the XML DTD 1.0 format becomes unsupported by XML readers.

action-plan.footnote: This action plan is currently under discussion and is subject to change.
